Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Exceptions
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    net.sf.mmm.util.lang.api.function.Consumer
    use Consumer directly.
    net.sf.mmm.util.lang.api.function.Function
    use Function directly.
    net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api.common.IconConstants
    we have switched to using styles instead of images and render these in CSS via font-awesome. This gives way more flexibility then <img> elements with hard-coded image URLs and names (including file type extensions). The only disadvantage is that we currently have no way to define alt texts for Accessibility.
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    net.sf.mmm.util.property.api.ReadOnlyPropertyImpl
    use WritableProperty.getReadOnly()
  • Deprecated Exceptions 
    Exceptions and Description
    net.sf.mmm.util.validation.api.ValidationErrorUserException
    use ValidationErrorUserException.
    net.sf.mmm.util.value.api.ValueConvertException
    use ValueConvertException
    net.sf.mmm.util.value.api.ValueException
    use ValueException
    net.sf.mmm.util.value.api.ValueNotSetException
    use ValueNotSetException
    net.sf.mmm.util.value.api.ValueOutOfRangeException
    use ValueOutOfRangeException
    net.sf.mmm.util.value.api.WrongValueTypeException
    use WrongValueTypeException
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    net.sf.mmm.util.io.api.EncodingUtil.ENCODING_ISO_8859_12
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    net.sf.mmm.util.value.api.ValueOutOfRangeException.checkRange(Number, Number, Number, Object)
    - will be removed - use ValueOutOfRangeException.checkRange(Object, Object, Object, Object) instead.
    net.sf.mmm.util.nls.api.NlsMessageFactory.create(NlsTemplate, Object...)
    use NlsMessageFactory.create(NlsTemplate, Map) instead.
    net.sf.mmm.util.nls.api.NlsMessageFactory.create(String, Object...)
    use NlsMessageFactory.create(String, Map) instead.
    net.sf.mmm.util.nls.api.NlsMessage.getArgument(int)
    use NlsMessage.getArgument(String) instead (and use named keys instead of numbers where possible).
    net.sf.mmm.util.nls.base.NlsMessagePlain.getArgument(int)
    net.sf.mmm.util.nls.base.AbstractNlsMessage.getArgument(int)
    use NlsMessage.getArgument(String)
    net.sf.mmm.util.nls.api.NlsMessage.getArgumentCount()
    this method does NOT make sense anymore.
    net.sf.mmm.util.nls.base.NlsMessagePlain.getArgumentCount()
    net.sf.mmm.util.nls.api.NlsMessage.getLocalizedMessage(Locale, NlsTemplateResolver)
    providing external NlsTemplateResolver has been discouraged.
    net.sf.mmm.util.nls.api.NlsMessage.getLocalizedMessage(Locale, NlsTemplateResolver, Appendable)
    providing external NlsTemplateResolver has been discouraged.
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    net.sf.mmm.util.value.api.ValueOutOfRangeException(Number, Number, Number)
    - will be removed soon - use ValueOutOfRangeException.ValueOutOfRangeException(Object, Object, Object) instead.
    net.sf.mmm.util.value.api.ValueOutOfRangeException(Number, Number, Number, Object)
    - will be removed soon - use ValueOutOfRangeException.ValueOutOfRangeException(Object, Object, Object, Object) instead.
    net.sf.mmm.util.value.api.ValueOutOfRangeException(Object, V, V, V)
    - will be removed soon - use ValueOutOfRangeException.ValueOutOfRangeException(Object, Object, Object, Object) instead.
